review: literally me

the game that introduced me to icepick lodge all those years ago before i even knew theyd become one of my favourite game devs of all time an excellent simple and short atmospheric experience of a game which is really what you make of it and how you perceive it its extremely open to interpretation and i think anyone can find something of value for themselves in its multitude of messages well worth the time and money
a dazzling display of creativity and fun
as my uncle used to tell me knock yourself on the head good thing you dont have to bang your head in this game
yes
weird game but okay to experience it for some time a bit repetitive

i like the game because i seen it on youtube before and its amazing but i cant seem to get it working i try to click new game and nothing happens at one point i got stuck in this endless loop of the credits as well please fix the game thank you
whos there
very old but good game fun getting all the achivements
i first saw this game 10 years ago on a youtube  simple gameplay with scary demons i really like it

a masterpiece without a doubt i used to have a childhood memory of seeing my uncle play this game and i remember being scared when i saw the hideandseek part the visuals the gameplay and overall design are all very unique this kind of old game is what i miss it brought back memories plus the portrayal of an insomniac person is veryÂ accurate
played it a few times good and spooky hard to beat returning about 7 yrs later to try
veeeeeery good game
this game is so good that i feel the insomnia and schizophrenia coming inside of me    loder
confusing as it is compelling
great game love this kind of stuff always inspires me to draw when i play
after being a fan of icepick lodge for more than a decade i have to admit that actually playing one of their games turned out to be a disappointment
this game is both cute and objectively terrifying hate the idea of things lurking around your house in the dark while filling you with a sense of dread great thats this game knock knock
this game is eerie and can make any time of the year feel like its halloween spooky stuff the game runs smooth with visuals and sounds that hold up years after release
a good concept though the execution could be better i enjoyed the game thoroughly during my time 100ing it but it is very repetitive

very charming horror game that can be beaten in maybe 23 hours the story if you can call it that is interesting albeit very vague i just wish hiding actually protected you from the monsters its also very punishing if you dont play hardball in the later levels since you cant reload from a previous level or a save still i pull it out every so often as a nostalgic treat
hard as balls and pretty repetitive but still fun you should check it out and play
2spooky4me

i cant explain it but knock knock is creepy in a very nightmarelogic kind of way explanations are few loud sounds and disturbances throughout the house set you on edge all with the promise of reaching dawn 810
every time theres a knock my dog goes nuts i love this game
tried to cower in fear behind my bed and accidentally leapt into a lovecraftian eye hole
fun atmospheric  always choose the woods and look around when birds are near

a terrifying dive into the depths of a shattered mind the lodger is an extremely unreliable narrator and flat out does not tell many key pieces of information in this story its all up to the player to figure out what any of the imagery really means and what the lodger really means when he speaks this game chills me in a way that most horror barely even touches i dread this game
very unique experience definitely worth checking it out
i love light bulbs
a scary thrilling game
really great hard to get a good ending the first playthrough while learning the mechanics but a great game for replays super spooky
a lovely confusing journey into madness
fun dark game
im not sure why i bothered finishing this game i thought it would get good or start making sense at some point but it never did
one of the best horror story games i ever played

one of the most stunning games ive ever played apart from gris i think its truly incredible how something can be so fearful and have literally no violence outstanding detail breathtaking artwork though my parents dont appreciate it as much as i do there not edgy it follows a very intricate story which im still trying to riddle out to this day this game is creepy beautiful sinister artful extremely fun and most definitely worth your time
fuck omori all my homies play knockknock
cool experience not a fun game
a very surreal game with beautiful artwork and a unique narrative
a very unique experience to be sure is the most accurate depiction of paranoid schizophrenia ive seen at least i think thats schizophrenia
theres not much to say about this game   its enjoyable for a few playthroughs but i wouldnt say its fun enough to try and actually get all of the achievements   little to no replay value
love this game
very good creepy yet adorable 3
good game super unique got it in a cheap dollar bundle money well spent lol
the only time you should play this game is when youre sleep deprived it really adds to the knockknock experience
one of my prized bingus in the world  knock knock my beloved i love you walking in the dark simulator thats all i gotta say
horror done right
worth it
i love the atmosphere of this game that makes you question what is reality and what isnt blurring the lines  i the tension at some parts of the game is really fun
i discovered the game thanks to markiplier and i enjoyed so much the first video that i bought it i find it a very creepy game because of the art style it has

i personally enjoy it a lot it keeps me on the edge the art is very unique and i easily racked up an hour playing it the story well maybe more like mild lore is very mysterious and is pretty open to any type of suggestions its confusing but trying to find out what it could mean is part of the fun for a pretty old game id give it a thumbs up
if i had the technical savvy to isolate the audio files and listen to each creepy voice line from this game in high definition i could die happy and sufficiently spooked
the design and atmosphere are exceptional but the gameplay pulls knock knock under the game relies on trial and error and i dont want to invest time in a game that punishes my efforts randomly

i have no idea about what happened in the entire time i played no info no settings just this guy speaking an incomprehensible language over and over and rooms to turn lights on also there seems to be a bug freezing my character making even harder to figure out what to do  id swear at some point i managed to game over because it started again from start with no warning was that aside a good graphic i have no idea what im into will be glad to change my mind eventually

another highly creative game by ice pick lodge in knockknock you explore the dreams of a lonely man who cant stop waking up from nightmares during the last hour before sunrise during these dreams you must survive a game of hideandseek whose rules you have forgotten  i dont know if knockknock is conventionally entertaining but i found the concept very original and interesting
i really like the style and atmosphere of this game as well as the ambiguity of everything in it gameplay isnt the best but overall it was a fun experience
easily my fav horrorgame
its one of the more eh boo games in my library and i could instantly tell

after hiding behind something once the game glitches out and no longer allows you to move left or right even though every other button continues to work just fine very disappointing bug that quite literally makes this game unplayable beware your mileage may vary
really cool game i enjoyed it
very atmospheric the monsters are horrifying to me waiting to see if they are coming is terrifying very hard to get the good ending for me at least perfect october game
truly wonderful the artstyle is amazing and its nice to see the story of the lodger unfold the scaresegments are hitting great its like an interactive painting
the most frustratingly good horror experience i had some difficulty getting the achievements but it is fine

knock knock is not for everyone if you dont like repetition do not get it if that doesnt bother you then please dig in i had it on my phone years back loved it so much it does take time and patience to get the good ending hopefully youll still have your sanity when you get there   you are a creepy little guy that opens doors and fixes light bulbs all while avoiding visitors and closing up holes they create

this game brings me back to the time ios 6 was up and i jailbroke it to get this game as i was too young to have any money later on i paid for it ios 10 and when i realized this game is also for pc i bought it immediately the games creepy but it brings me to the time where the only worry ive had was if a monster would jump on me during playing this game at night while laying in bed thank you for the experience icepick lodge
delightfully horrifying for a game with such simple graphics it builds beautiful atmosphere
mysterious creepy and wonderfully implemented this is one of my favourite horror games
its such a great game if you like more atmospheric horror games then this is a must have the sound design is a beautiful creation with obvious passion put into it and the slow pace is perfect
nifty little experience with great design interesting mechanics and dark trippy atmosphere everything works as intended  810 knocks are actually at your window in the middle of the night

brilliant atmosphere particularly the sound  headphones recommended great art style interesting gameplay and story definitely worth getting even if you arent much into horror games  however i would say you probably need a guide to get the good ending and in the later levels you cant lose too much sanity or else you get softlocked
great atmosphere great story great experience

amazing atmosphere never knew what to expect in each house as theyre randomly generated i assume the creepiness is through the roof with the noises how your character rambles incoherently and the spooky monsters you have chances of running into good luck and dont open the knocked on doors
if you like simple and yet creepy atmosphere this is a perfect game for you
i can never get enough of playing this its very relaxing sometimes i get scared because certain monsters show up randomly and scare the crap out of me i will always recommend this game
i really like the idea that the dev elaborated here
fun little horror game 1010 would recommend
effective fear and mystique combined with good audio and effective russian chitterings
a terrible world in which there are no led bulbs alas im too afraid of loud noises creaking doors and giant lovecraftian eyeportals in the walls to play this game more than 10 minutes

this game is interesting and hard in my opinion still trying to figure out what i am suppose to do and what not but as far as i can tell its a brilliant time waster not that scary as some people have claimed it to be especially after you get the hang of it but still good

a very artistic short game i recommended it but let me gave you a bit suggestion try and reading the guide around the community before playing this game or you will be sorry when its too late to realize you playing it wrong the whole time like i do

tags adventure  sidescroll additional tags delete local content  remove from library  tldr lack of guidance and direction turns this adventure game into nearly a puzzle game fairly boring and slow to progress in not worth fetching a guide for it

this game is really good at keeping you tense atmosphere is perfect for dark autumn nights or rainy summer days watching lodger going in insane and theoreticly dying in the end  theres a lot of interesting easter eggs so if you into it  try it  i really loved it as developers told the story behind creating knockknock is somebody sent them anonomius letter that described stuff that happening in the game
amazing atmospheric horror game covers dark themes in a way that doesnt villianize mental illness fun gameplay difficult over time would replay again
i imagined a hot anime girl and it didnt exist in my house bad game
hihi xd
this game is spooky and weird which is exactly what i was looking for when i stumbled upon this game i really dig the art style and the atmosphere is unsettling as heck

this game has got to be one of the best ones i have played so far it makes me feel paranoid gives me jumpscares when i least expect them and leaves me curious enough to keep playing i would recommend this to those that wish to have a good fright
a perfect indie game with a nice story

yay a decent horror game  pros great atmosphere good scares  cons  not very clear on some mechanics in the game sometimes some enemies hurt your time sometimes they dont gameplay can get repetitive barely any replay value  6510 pretty good get it while it is on sale now  none the less still scarier than five nights at freddys

first of all i met this game on my friends computer and immidiately liked it then i downloaded it for free by torrent and completed the game i realised how great this game is fantastic and horrific so i purchased it on steam just to share me thanks to developer
i enjoy it its simple suspenseful creepy dark a bit repetitive but not so bad it gave me jumps and fright sometimes
too damn creepy ill probably never play this again
fun horror game definitely recommed
paranoia has darkened my eyes
definitely one of my favourite games with a twisted story and a nightmare of a life this game really is a great way to spend your evening or your life
